name: The Siege of the Bastille
obverse: Amidst much smoke, the revolutionaries fire cannon and muskets at the Bastille.
obverse_inscriptions: PRISE PAR LES CITOYENS DE LA VILLE DE PARIS
description: This medal is a clich√©: it only has a design on one side.
